title: She Was Killed By Shooting Stars - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Mystery   Romance   Sci-fi   Supernatural   Tragedy
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Evil Organizations   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Modern Day   Mystery Solving   Proactive Protagonist   Time Travel
author: Takeshi Matsuyama   松山剛
description:
On that day, all the satellites in orbit plummeted and vanished like specks of light in the atmosphere. This event, called 'the world's most beautiful terrorist attack,' had only one casualty! Daichi Hirano, a high school student, must battle fate in order to save Hoshino Amano, a solitary girl.

The story's major themes are 'space' and 'dreams.'>
